entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning early this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
